apiKey.label: OpenAI API Key
apiKey.text: To use this extension, users have to create an account in OpenAI and get a key to set it in here.
apiKey.textHelper: Once the key is filled in, press tab to have it validated

maxLength.label: Max Summarized Text
maxLength.text: Set the maximum number of characters the summarized text should have.

minChars.label: Min Original Text (chars)
minChars.text: Set the minimum number of characters in a web page text to be detected.

minWords.label: Min Original Text (words)
minWords.text: Set the minimum number of words in a web page text to be detected.
